aekiro_radiogroup.name: Radio Group
aekiro_radiogroup.description: Makes a sprite object behave like a radio group (to be used with a radio button).

value.name: Value
value.desc: The initial value of the radio group.

isenabled0.description: True if the radio group is currently enabled.

setvalue0.description: Set the value of the radio group.

value0.name: value
value0.desc: The new value of the model

setenabled1.display-text: Set all the radio buttons to [i]{0}[/i]

state2.name: State
state2.desc: The state of all the radio buttons of this radio group.

value0.description: Get the value of the radio group.
